description:
When a volume is attached to an instance and the compute server is restarted the .xml of the instance lost the attached volume.

This only happen if the instance don´t have a reboot after the volume attach.  If reboot the instance, and next reboot the compute server, the .xml is saved and the volume attached as expected.
title: When attach volume lost attach when node restart

comments.content:
When a volume is attached to an instance and the compute server is restarted the .xml of the instance lost the attached volume.

This only happen if the instance don´t have a reboot after the volume attach.  If reboot the instance, and next reboot the compute server, the .xml is saved and the volume attached as expected.
